document.body:
What the %#!? happened? Campusfood is Now GrubHub. They have more restaurants, more cities, and more free ordering.

Delivery Pickup Delivery&Pickup Delivery Pickup Delivery&Pickup GrubHub may have bought Campusfood, but your legacy with them may still earn you some Free Grub. Move your account to find out. And read more about the acquisition in this New York Times article or on our blog

Internet Explorer 6, eh? Sadly, we can no longer support your outdated internet cruiser.
Why? Because it's old. Older than the iPod, older than Windows XP, even older than East Timor. So we're pulling the plug, and some site features might not work for you. Switch over to Firefox , Google Chrome , or the latest version of IE .
Sadly, we're no longer supporting IE7.
Why? It's old, and it just can't keep up with us anymore so we're pulling the plug. This means some site features might not work for you anymore. We recommend taking a look at Firefox , Google Chrome , or the latest version of IE .
